
## Profile plots

```{r "profile plots", fig.width = 20, fig.height = 20}
if(length(profile_pdfs) > 0) {
  profile_pdfs <- str_c(report_dir, profile_pdfs)
  
  # Create a list of embed tags
  embed_tags <- lapply(profile_pdfs, function(i) {
    htmltools::tags$embed(src = i, 
                         type = "application/pdf", 
                         width = "100%", 
                         height = "900px")
  })
  
  # Print the tagList
  htmltools::tagList(embed_tags)
}
```
